summary: Craftable Nord Chainmail Armor for UNP Body (multilingual [DE, EN, RU])
descriptionHtml:
This mod is multilingual [DE, EN, RU].
The Mod is compatible with any version of Skyrim, inclusive Dawnguard.
Please endorse this mod if you like it.

[color=green][b][u]Version 1.2.1[/u][/b][/color]
Credits for this Armor goes to:
[list][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2859]TheGreenLion[/url] for the original chainmail texture.[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11252]PanTast[/url] for the modified texture.[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7305]Exeter[/url] for the UNP meshes.[/list]

I only put the things together and made a standalone, craftable, light Armor out of this.
You can enchant and upgrade the Armor.

The set consists of:
[list][*]Helmet (it is the standard "Ancient Nord Helmet" but it fits with the Armor)[*]Gauntlets (textures from TheGreenLion)[*]Boots (textures from TheGreenLion)[*]Cuirass (textures from TheGreenLion modified from PanTast with meshes from Exeter)[/list]

Big thanks to the named Modders for their awesome work.

[b]Requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] for perfect work.[/b]

Thanks for translations:
[list][*]into Russian by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=241997]Shadowmann[/url][/list]

[color=yellow][b]Bugs:[/b][/color]
None so far, please report if you find some.

[color=yellow][b]Install:[/b][/color]
Copy the "data" folder from the archive to your Skyrim directory.
If asked to overwrite, say yes.
Start the Skyrim launcher, go to "Data Files" and make sure the files are activated.

[color=yellow][b]Uninstall:[/b][/color]
Delete the chainmail.esp from your "...\Skyrim\data" directory.
author: johnwayne1930
